## Column {width=30%}

Install `tidyverse`

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
install.packages('tidyverse')
```

Load `tidyverse`

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
library(tidyverse)
```


## Column {width=60%}

Use `tidyverse`

```{r}
tidyverse::tidyverse_logo()
```
